alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 4:10PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madera, southeastern Merced and western Fresno Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 410 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles north of Firebaugh, or 21 miles west of Madera, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Firebaugh. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota
